casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2006-1247. Harris v. Mt. Sinai Med. Ctr.

Cuyahoga App. Nos. 85286, 85574, and 85605, 166 Ohio App.3d 647, 2006-Ohio-2206. Reported at 116 Ohio St.3d 139, 2007-Ohio-5587, 876 N.E.2d 1201. On motion for reconsideration and motion for stay of issuance of mandate pending petition for certiorari to the United States Supreme Court. Motions denied.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
